=================
sphinx-embeddings
=================

Embeddings-powered features for Sphinx projects

----------
Quickstart
----------

1. ``html_baseurl``
2. ``html_file_suffix``

.. -----------
.. Development
.. -----------
.. 
.. Setup
.. =====
.. 
.. .. code-block:: console
.. 
..    curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
..    uv venv
..    source .venv/bin/activate
..    uv pip install -r requirements.txt
.. 
.. Build
.. =====
.. 
.. .. code-block:: console
.. 
..    source .venv/bin/activate
..    sphinx-build -b html . _build
